introZh: 涵盖超分、低光增强、去除雨雪雾等任务，构建端到端恢复工具箱（如 XReflection），保障真实应用的稳定输出。
introEn: Covering super-resolution, low-light enhancement, rain/snow/fog removal, etc., building end-to-end restoration toolboxes (e.g., XReflection) to ensure stable output in real-world applications.

introZh: 面向跨域目标检测与语义分割，探索鲁棒特征对齐、时空特征聚合与轻量化推理策略，支撑城市与工业场景的实时智能感知。
introEn: Tackle cross-domain detection and semantic segmentation via robust feature alignment, spatiotemporal aggregation, and lightweight inference to empower real-time perception in urban and industrial settings.

introZh: 聚焦跨模态感知与融合算法，构建统一的图像、文本、传感器数据协同理解体系，支撑更鲁棒的智能决策。
introEn: Advance multimodal perception and fusion algorithms that unify vision, language, and sensor data for more robust intelligent decision-making.
